transcript:
Customer: Sir party kya karega Rajan Sons wale ka?

(silence)
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Mai keh raha tha sir ki ye jo product hai na sir jo aapke humne add jo product missing hai wo product ki photo aapko mail par karni padegi sir wo product ka naam jo add karwana hai aapko.
Customer: Ji haan.
Executive: Kya? Sir wo usme mil jayegi na Google pe milegi aapko ya site pe milegi aapko Western ki.
Customer: Sir actually kya hai na sir hume company ne wahi bola hai ki product jab multiple bulk product hote hai na to customer ke kisi bhi profile se copy nahi kar sakte customer ko aap mail par mangiye product ka naam aur photo aur daliye. Western ki side se customer ko guide kar dijiye. Western ki side me keh raha hu website pe. Uski specification website ke Western ki side se.
Customer: Sir Western company alag hai Rajan Sons alag hai na sir.
Executive: To product to wahi hai na sir. Mai to uska distributor hu Western company ka.
Customer: Nahi to aise nahi dal sakte sir Western wale ne kal ke date me complaint dal de ki aap mere apne mere photo kyu dal diye fir hum kaise dal denge sir khud sochiye.
Executive: Kal ke date me company complaint dalti hai ki bhaiya jo Muradabad wala jo add hua hai na waisa hi hua hua hai. Mai to us company ka distributor hu.
Customer: Product to mere wahi hai na. Distributor baat wo nahi hai Western ka hai Muradabad ka aapne bilkul kiya hoga but wahi bulk me hum dalte restriction aa rahi hai yaha par hamare pass ki ek limit ke baad hum product dale to mana kar raha hai ki aap na restriction aa raha hai ki hum nahi dal sakte hai. Customer se mail par daliye tabhi maine aapko phone kiya ki mail par daliye.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Haan. Aur Western ki site hai Western ki site ka man ke chaliye kal aapki image koi aur copy kar le to fir us tarah se allowed nahi hai to Western ke mail id se mail dalwa dijiye ki mai authorize kar raha hu aur Western aapki company hai usko authorize kar dijiye. Chaliye thik hai mai aapko chalu rakhiye do second do second. Haan. Ya to product ki photo de dijiye na sir aap nikal ke Google par product par mai dal deta hu ki aap apne end se kar sakte kaam nahi kar raha sir aap.
Customer: Ja raha hai. Aur isme mere ko likh ke likh likh ke bhi aa raha hai ki content is protected. Aap try kijiye isme likh ke aa raha hai content is protected.
(On hold music)
(On hold music)
(On hold music)
(On hold music)
(On hold music)
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hanji sir.
Customer: Haan bataiye.
Executive: Hanji hanji boliye sir.
Customer: Haan mai keh raha tha sir jo aap bata rahe hai na Western ki site se. To sir abhi hum jo profile kara rahe hai na Western ki site par. So dono jagah se restriction prohibited aa raha hai jaise abhi Pandey aapko screenshot bhejega usme likh ke aa raha hai jaise uske website me aisa kuch content hoga ki ek limit ke baad product dalne ke baad hamare yaha bhi aa raha hai ki kisi content se product dalne ke baad upload aa raha hai content is prohibited. To company se maine baat ki to company ne ye bola ki customer jo bhi dalwa rahe hai customer se mail id par mang lijiye ki aap jo product dal rahe hai uski photo aur mail daliye hum dal denge. Okay sir kya hota hai ki ho sakta hai ki sir unhone kuch aisa content prohibited kar rakha ho ki kal din dal de ki aap mera puchiye mere se kaise product dal rahe hai Western ka. Yehi cheez hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ya aap unse aap unke distributor aap unse product ka naam dalwa lijiye mangwa lijiye aur photo aur mail par bhej dijiye 500 1000 jitne product dalwane hai aap mujhe mail par dal dijiye mai dal deta hu. To fir jitne me limit hai ki 170 80 tak dala uske baad na wo prohibited aane laga. Aap apne end se kya pata dal sakte hai par hamare end se wo dikkat aa rahi hai sir dal nahi pa rahe hai. Hum apne end se bhi nahi dal pa rahe aur unke website se bhi copy karne ka try kar rahe hai image to wo aa raha hai kya pata unke software me aisa koi issue aa raha hoga usme likh ke aa raha hai ki content is prohibited. Kyuki ek IP address se bar bar karne par wo cheez aa rahi hai na sir ki kuch software me aisa coding woding kiya hua unhone. Hmm. Ye dikkat aa rahi hai sir. To aap iska ye solution hai ki aap isko mail par mujhe de dijiye jo product missing hai ye product ka naam hai wo naam dal deta hu photo aap Google se ya to dal dijiye.
Customer: Sir dekhiye agar mere ko aapko bhejna hi hoga isse badhiya mai khud hi nahi kar lunga add yaar. Hai na? Sir maine mana nahi kar raha maine 180 ke baad wo mana kar raha hai product company bhi par kisi aur ki website se aap dalwa rahe hai man ke chaliye kal unhone bhi unke unhone software me hi restrict kar rakha hai to mai kaise kar sakta hu. Meri baat suniye meri baat suniye meri baat suniye jo Muradabad jo catalog hai na jo unhone add kiya hai unhone bhi aise hi add kiya hai na? Sir unhone khud se kiya hoga sir. Kya keh rahe hai sir? Ya to khud se add kiya hoga fir ho sakta hai unhone. Nahi nahi nahi sir unhone jo waha pe ladke jo aate hai na manager jo aate hai visiting ke liye. Sir itne product mere baat suniye.
Customer: Waha ek product product jo owner jo hai na Muradabad wale ek bhi order unhone ek bhi. Sir. Sir mai aapko dikha sakta hu mai aapko screenshot bhej raha hu. Mai kal baat karta hu aap se. Sir kal ki baat hi nahi hai sir aapko kuch mai yaha se mai aapko solution de raha mai yaha se dal nahi paunga aap mujhe mail par dalenge tabhi mai dal paunga iske alawa koi solution hai nahi sir. That's it mai aapko solution bata diya baki kuch hai aap mail par baat kijiye mere se. Thik hai. Thank you. Tata concern band kar raha hu thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to add products to catalog.

- Content prohibited error while uploading products.

- Wants to add products from Western company.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to send product details via mail.

- Explained restrictions on bulk uploads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send product details via mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, product upload, restrictions, mail
